Title: Lander2000
Date: 2025-01-25
Template: pico8
Status: hidden
Game_js: lander2000.js
Game_thumb: data:image/png;base64,

**Lander2000** is a PICO-8 game I made a while back that is based on the classic Lunar Lander game but with a few twists. You have limited fuel and are instantly fighting gravity, causing you to have to think on your feet and balance taking your time and being careful versus fuel consumption and falling to your doom.

This is the most "complete" game i've made for the PICO-8 platform and has procedurally generated levels, music/soundfx, and has been published on the [official BBS](https://www.lexaloffle.com/bbs/?tid=143508) which means it's now available on all PICO-8 systems if you search for it.

#### Instructions

Use `UP` on your keyboard for your main thruster, and `LEFT` and `RIGHT` arrows for side thrusters. Land on the pad (gently!) before running out of fuel to continue to the next level.
